snippet.title: Nintendo Game And Watch (Commercial, 1983)
snippet.description:
Here's a commercial for the Nintendo Game and Watch - featuring some animated scenes of Nintendo characters.

Adventure is on the horizon, 
Stanley’s going buggy, 
Mario brothers got their hands full,
And Donkey Kong is going ape.
It’s rough seas for Popeye 
And Snoopy’s gotta get on the ball
But you can help, you got neentendo game and watch
That’s pocket power!
Widescreen or multi screen games you can play indoors or out
They tell you the score and even the time
Their pocket power! Their Game and Watch
14 and all only from, Nintendo!!!
This aired on local Chicago TV in June 1983.
